page.title: 11A GRAFTON SUNDAY
page.content: On Sunday people usually get up later than on normal week days.Many then get dressed into their best clothes,have breakfast and feed their pets if they have any and then to to church or Sunday School. After that, they go home and amuse themselves by reading the papers or playing games until lunch.A Sunday lunch usually consists of some kind of meat and vegetables, with something like fruit salad or trifle for pudding. After lunch the children play games like ludo, monopoly, tennis, ball and roller skating. Or they play with their pets.Father reads the newspaper which tells us news, sport and weather. At tea they may just have a snack, then they amuse themselves until bedtime by either watching television, reading or playing a game of cards or a board game.
